name: De~Magnets (Central Goons Studios)
description: This is a game based on two magnet pieces-North and South, in which you play as South magnet and you have to find the north magnet and charge it, you both are best friends so your friendship is stronger together. There would be two bars in the game which will show your charge and north magnet's charge, the upper bar shows your charge and once it decreases whenever you touch a demagnetizer which is of grey color, your health decreases, and when the bar is empty the level will restart showing the message of demagnetization, Hope you will enjoy the game.
